config.statement: delete from mm_mis_log_properties where event_id in (select event_id from mm_mis_log where time_stamp< current_date - 30)
delete from mm_mis_log where time_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '30' day)

module.ref: purge MM_QUEUE for file that do not exist or are purged

config.statement: delete from mm_queue where creation_stamp < (localtimestamp - interval '6' day)

delete from workflow_item_asset where workflow_item_id in (select workflow_item_id from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '1' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id = (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key = 'Send to DTI')))

delete from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '1' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id = (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key = 'Send to DTI'))

delete from workflow_item_asset where workflow_item_id in (select workflow_item_id from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '14' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id = (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key = 'Library Correction') and is_final_state = '1'))

delete from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '14' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id = (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key = 'Library Correction') and is_final_state = '1')

delete from workflow_item_asset where workflow_item_id in (select workflow_item_id from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '5' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key in ('Set to Commissioned', 'Unset Commissioned', 'Set Handout Publicity Material', 'Unset Handout Publicity Material', 'Set to Social Media Internet', 'Unset Social Media Internet', 'Set to Getty Negotiated', 'Make Batch', 'Override Cost Indicator', 'Reset Cost Indicator')) and is_final_state = '1'))

delete from workflow_item where creation_stamp<(localtimestamp - interval '5' day) and state_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where parent_id in (select node_id from workflow_hierarchy where key in ('Set to Commissioned', 'Unset Commissioned', 'Set Handout Publicity Material', 'Unset Handout Publicity Material', 'Set to Social Media Internet', 'Unset Social Media Internet', 'Set to Getty Negotiated', 'Make Batch', 'Override Cost Indicator', 'Reset Cost Indicator')) and is_final_state = '1')
delete from MM_PROCESS_MONITOR where LAST_UPDATE < (localtimestamp - interval '1' day)
DELETE FROM MM_LOCK WHERE DATE_CREATED < (localtimestamp - interval '1' day)

module.ref: Purge all MM_MLT_ENRICH_QUEUE as its no longer used at Telegraph

config.statement: truncate table mm_enrich_queue
truncate table mm_mlt_enrich_queue

module.ref: Delete rows older than 1 hour from all _DEL tables
